subject: Complex environment setup (Re: [junit] Recursive TestRunner)
msgSnippet: Rakesh: Can you tell us more about the environment you have that requires this complex and expensive environment setup? What kind of environment is it, and
messageBody:
Rakesh:

Can you tell us more about the environment you have that requires this
complex and expensive environment setup? What kind of environment is it,
and perhaps more importantly, how did it get to be that way?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
